segments.text: Hey Joanne . What are you up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so bored . I don't know what I'm going to do today and it is only ten in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . Do you think we are boring people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think we are boring . It's just that we don't have any hobbies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . What do you think we should do as a hobby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That all depends on what you like to do . For example , I like to doodle on the notepad , so I'm thinking about doing some real drawings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to play the piano for fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . That can be a good hobby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hobbies are great . I'm going to make a list of all the things I like to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a great idea . I'm going to do the same .
segments.speaker: S1
